title: (4087) Brand New Two Storied House For Sale, Malabe Isurupura.
details: Brand New Two Storied House for Sale, Malabe Isurupura. Parking Porch for 3 Vehicles With Remote Control Gate. Imported Porcelain Tiled Living, Dining Area Fully Tiled Pantry With fitted Cupboards, 4 Bed Rooms With fully Tiled 3 Bathrooms, TV Lounge Balconies & Roof Top Terrace Maids Toilet & Kitchen Yard Small Garden Space Luxury finises at affordable Price Very Good Residential Location Well Designed By Reputed Architects. Total Only 400 Meters from Malabe Kaduwela Main Road. Rs : 210 (Negotiable) 21 Million
